revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

body.p: I have been badly pulled by the heat—am sick—(home here with my mother)—& would respectfully apply for two weeks further leave—if it can be granted.
If so, I will try to make it up.

postscript.p: I am due at office on the 11th, and would ask two weeks extension from that date.
